00022 #region Usings
00023 using System;
00024 using System.Collections.Generic;
00025 
00026 #endregion
00027 
00028 namespace Utilities.Web.Email.MIME
00029 {
00033     public class Field
00034     {
00035         #region Constructor
00036 
00037 
00038 
00039         public Field()
00040         {
00041         }
00042 
00047         public Field(string FieldText)
00048         {
00049             if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(FieldText))
00050                 throw new ArgumentNullException();
00051 
00052             int Index = FieldText.IndexOf(':');
00053             if (Index != -1)
00054                 Name = FieldText.Substring(0, Index);
00055 
00056             ++Index;
00057             FieldText = FieldText.Substring(Index, FieldText.Length - Index).Trim();
00058             string[] Splitter = { ";" };
00059             string[] Attributes = FieldText.Split(Splitter, StringSplitOptions.RemoveEmptyEntries);
00060             foreach (string AttributeText in Attributes)
00061             {
00062                 Code TempCode = CodeManager.Instance[Name];
00063                 if (TempCode != null)
00064                 {
00065                     string TempText = "";
00066                     TempCode.Decode(AttributeText, out TempText);
00067                     this.Attributes.Add(new Attribute(TempText));
00068                     CharacterSet = TempCode.CharacterSet;
00069                 }
00070                 else
00071                 {
00072                     this.Attributes.Add(new Attribute(AttributeText));
00073                 }
00074             }
00075         }
00076         #endregion
00077 
00078         #region Public Properties
00079         private string _Name="";
00080         private List<Attribute> _Attributes=new List<Attribute>();
00081         private string _CharacterSet="";
00082 
00086         public string Name
00087         {
00088             get { return _Name; }
00089             set { _Name = value; }
00090         }
00091 
00095         public List<Attribute> Attributes
00096         {
00097             get { return _Attributes; }
00098             set { _Attributes = value; }
00099         }
00100 
00104         public string CharacterSet
00105         {
00106             get { return _CharacterSet; }
00107             set { _CharacterSet = value; }
00108         }
00109 
00115         public string this[string Key]
00116         {
00117             get
00118             {
00119                 foreach (Attribute TempAttribute in Attributes)
00120                 {
00121                     if (TempAttribute.Name.Equals(Key,StringComparison.InvariantCultureIgnoreCase))
00122                     {
00123                         return TempAttribute.Value;
00124                     }
00125                 }
00126                 return "";
00127             }
00128         }
00129         #endregion
00130     }
00131 }
